snippet.title: Loop8: Summer of Gods | Locales Trailer
snippet.description:
In an alternate reality of 1980s Japan, Nini's adventures in Loop8: Summer of Gods take place in the beautiful coastal village of Ashihara. Relax at some of the beautiful vistas in our "Locales Trailer", set to "Love's Sweet Sorrow" a track from the game's soundtrack by composer, Noriyuki Iwadare.

﻿Read more about the creation of Ashihara in our interview with the game's designer and scenario writer, Yuri Shibamura: https://marvelousgames.com/news/the-inspiration-behind-loop8s-town-of-ashihara

In this original coming-of-age RPG, step into the life of Nini, a newly earthbound teen who arrives in the quaint Japanese town of Ashihara in August 1983. 
With one month until the world ends, how will you spend each day?

Find out more on: 
Web: https://marvelousgames.com/
Twitter: http://twitter.com/marvelouseurope
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/marvelouseurope
Instagram: http://instagram.com/marvelouseurope
